Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Phase 1 prototype UI for serverless function composition

Add web-based prototype demonstrating UI as composition layer for serverless
functions. Users interact with a simple "Create Function" form while the UI
composes multiple Kubernetes resources behind the scenes.

Phase 1 focuses on scaling/runtime resources:
- Deployment (apps/v1) - runtime workload starting at 0 replicas
- Service (v1) - stable network endpoint
- HTTPScaledObject (http.keda.sh/v1alpha1) - KEDA scaling configuration

Features:
- Radio button UI with collapsible panels for scaling metric selection
- Support for both concurrency and requestRate metrics per KEDA v0.11.1 spec
- Live YAML generation showing composed resources
- Visual distinction between user perspective and platform perspective
- All resources labeled with serverless.openshift.io/function

The prototype demonstrates how the UI prevents "API soup" by providing a
single conceptual interface while composing multiple platform resources.
